listitem.para: #define iec_anytype_allowed(data, A, B, C, D, E, F)
return true if value fit in type
#define ANY_BIT(x) (x == IEC_T_BOOL || x == IEC_T_UINT || x == IEC_T_WORD || x == IEC_T_DWORD || x == IEC_T_LWORD)
#define ANY_UNSIGNED(x) (x == IEC_T_USINT || x == IEC_T_UINT || x == IEC_T_UDINT || x == IEC_T_ULINT)
#define ANY_SIGNED(x) (x == IEC_T_SINT || x == IEC_T_INT || x == IEC_T_DINT || x == IEC_T_LINT)
#define ANY_BOOL(x) (x == IEC_T_BOOL || x == IEC_T_R_EDGE || x == IEC_T_F_EDGE)
#define ANY_ELEMENTARY(x) (ANY_BIT(x) || ANY_NUM(x) || ANY_DATE(x) || ANY_STRING(x) || x == IEC_T_TIME)
enum IEC_ERRORS { IEC_OK = 0x00 , IEC_NAT = 0x01 , IEC_TRN = 0x02 , IEC_OOR = 0x03 , IEC_TND = 0x04 , IEC_NLL = 0x05 , IEC_TRU = 0x06 , IEC_FLS = 0x07 , IEC_ENL = 0x08 , IEC_ERR = 0xff }

enum iectype_t { IEC_T_NULL = 0x00 , IEC_T_BOOL = 0x01 , IEC_T_SINT = 0x02 , IEC_T_USINT = 0x03 , IEC_T_BYTE = 0x04 , IEC_T_INT = 0x05 , IEC_T_UINT = 0x06 , IEC_T_WORD = 0x07 , IEC_T_DINT = 0x08 , IEC_T_UDINT = 0x09 , IEC_T_DWORD = 0x0a , IEC_T_LINT = 0x0b , IEC_T_ULINT = 0x0c , IEC_T_LWORD = 0x0d , IEC_T_REAL = 0x0e , IEC_T_LREAL = 0x0f , IEC_T_TIME = 0x10 , IEC_T_DATE = 0x11 , IEC_T_TOD = 0x12 , IEC_T_DT = 0x13 , IEC_T_CHAR = 0x14 , IEC_T_WCHAR = 0x15 , IEC_T_STRING = 0x16 , IEC_T_WSTRING = 0x17 , IEC_T_POINTER = 0x18 , IEC_T_TABLE = 0x19 , IEC_T_USER = 0x1a , IEC_T_R_EDGE = 0x1b , IEC_T_F_EDGE = 0x1c , IEC_T_TIMER = 0x1d , IEC_T_NDEF_1E = 0x1e , IEC_T_NDEF_1F = 0x1f }
enum tt_t { TT_MARK = 0x01 , TT_PERSIST = 0x02 , TT_RETAIN = 0x04 , TT_MAINTAIN = 0x08 , TT_CONSTANT = 0x10 , TT_INITILZD = 0x20 , TT_FLAG1 = 0x40 , TT_FLAG2 = 0x80 }

(value >= UCHAR_MIN) && (value <= UCHAR_MAX) && (round(val) == value) : \ ((data)->type == IEC_T_SINT) ?
